name: Test get users list
description: Verify retrieving users list with different task IDs
descriptionHtml: Verify retrieving users list with different task IDs
statusMessage:
AssertionError: Meta 'total' should be greater than 0 for Task-Id api-21, 
assert 0 > 0
 +  where 0 = Meta(total=0).total
 +    where Meta(total=0) = UsersResponse(meta=Meta(total=0), users=[UserResponse(uuid=UUID('3cb61d2c-234b-4cde-87c9-e61c21a7d9cc'), email='penny07@example.com', name='Gerald', nickname='ajohnson', avatar_url=''), UserResponse(uuid=UUID('2ed46da7-2d96-4da2-af16-74dfc34174ca'), email='alex@gmail.com', name='Alex', nickname='alex', avatar_url=''), UserResponse(uuid=UUID('ec70933a-93ee-4e5d-b48c-25509a138496'), email='hannahmatthews@example.com', name='April', nickname='carol96', avatar_url=''), UserResponse(uuid=UUID('bdec583b-fe43-4ed7-8abd-266d99e71ec9'), email='barneslynn@example.net', name='Christopher', nickname='cestrada', avatar_url=''), UserResponse(uuid=UUID('78746a00-7f15-4ba7-bc81-f6a23f5eb115'), email='xavier96@example.com', name='Tracey', nickname='daniel99', avatar_url=''), UserResponse(uuid=UUID('75bc58d9-7d3f-40b7-add7-50852d496e44'), email='lmcguire@example.net', name='Travis', nickname='donald20', avatar_url=''), UserResponse(uuid=UUID('c1eabae2-c6af-457d-8bdd-b51e2f9d0293'), email='charlestaylor@example.net', name='Jessica', nickname='jonesbrian', avatar_url=''), UserResponse(uuid=UUID('4a0559af-4951-40a3-a91f-a0f404900bb8'), email='kate@gmail.com', name='Kate', nickname='kate', avatar_url=''), UserResponse(uuid=UUID('27645e3b-cd86-42a6-a6f9-a8542fc1172c'), email='kennethwhitaker@example.net', name='Aaron', nickname='kyle16', avatar_url=''), UserResponse(uuid=UUID('47c11c4a-0b59-4a02-92a5-625b188f71c9'), email='max@gmail.com', name='Max', nickname='max', avatar_url='')]).meta
